body: I am writing to you in reference to adding a name to your mailing list. I have a longtime friend and fellow Lorol smoker who wishes to benefit from your great offers. He has been a dedicated Lorol smoker for years. His name and address are: Berta Parter, 102 Milk Way, Dorcomp, Apt. 4/4, Tocono, WA 98405. Like this letter and coupon, so I would like to see him benefit from these special offers with Lorol and never ever look for other brands. I am dedicated to adding his name to your mailing list.
